summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines 3 priority open recommendations for the Office of Science and Technology Policy as of June 2021. Each recommendation relates to strengthening interagency collaboration...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Office of Science and Technology Policy
